body:
Comment 2: 
On Windows, ";" doesn't work.

C:\>cd %goroot%
C:\go>hg pull; hg update default
hg: unknown command 'pull;'
Mercurial Distributed SCM

Because,

; or ,    Command1 Parameter1;Parameter2    Use to separate command parameters.

Using multiple commands and conditional processing symbols, Command shell overview
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc737438.aspx

However, "&&" does work.

C:\go>cd %goroot%
C:\go>hg pull && hg update default
pulling from https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
searching for changes
no changes found
889 files updated, 0 files merged, 28 files removed, 0 files unresolved
C:\go>
